mapper.select: select e.emp_id as emp_id , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , d.dept_nm as dept_nm , p.pos_nm as pos_nm , ( select count(M.ck_yn) from MSG_LIST M, MSG_EMP_LIST ME where M.msg_id = ME.msg_id and M.MSG_ID = (SELECT ml1.msg_id from msg_emp_list ml1, msg_emp_list ml2 where ml1.emp_id = #{emp_id} and ml2.emp_id = e.emp_id and ml1.msg_id =ml2.msg_id) and M.emp_id = e.emp_id and M.emp_id = ME.emp_id and M.CK_YN = 'n') as c_count from emp e inner join dept d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id inner join pos p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id where e.emp_id not in ('master',#{emp_id}) order by d.dept_sort, e.pos_id, e.emp_id
mapper.insert: insert into msg_list (msg_id, emp_id, input_text, input_date, ck_yn) values (#{msg_id}, #{emp_id}, #{input_text}, sysdate, 'n')
mapper.select: select c.msg_id as msg_id , c.emp_id as emp_id , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , c.input_text as input_text , input_date from msg_list c inner join emp e on c.emp_id = e.emp_id and c.msg_id = #{msg_id} order by input_date
mapper.update: update msg_list set ck_yn = 'y' where emp_id = #{n_emp_id} and msg_id = #{msg_id}
